name: Piano Nobile Pocket Notebook
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Jot it down - 100% handmade, refillable, sized to fit Pocket sized Moleskine Cahier softcover journals.

Features a colored elastic band closure and a pen/pencil slot for security and convenience.  Blank journal and pencil included.

Dimensions: 3.75" X 6.25"

Hand screen printed with original art work by Piano Nobile. Some variation in print quality and cropping will occur to due the very hand made nature of our items.

Original design and hand manufacturing by R&L Goods
Original artwork and printing by Piano Nobile

What's it made of? 2 layers of cotton, adhered together to form a fray resistant material.

name: R.L Billfold in Recycled Leather
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Our I.D. Billfold design is now available in Recycled Leather.

A one piece construction wonder - Features include 4 staggered card slots, 1 I.D. window, 1 bill pocket, and an elastic security strap to keep everything in place.

Dimensions: 3.5" x 4.25"

What's it made of? Our Recycled Leather is made from finely ground scraps of leather which would otherwise be discarded. The finished material is 90% post industrial waste combined with natural rubber.

Available for shipment in September 2011.

name: R.L. Cardcase in Recycled Leather
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Our cardcase design is now available in Recycled Leather. 

Just the essentials - Features include 2 pockets for cards or folded cash storage, plus an elastic security strap.

Dimensions: 4" x 2.75"

Original design and hand manufacturing by R&L Goods

What's it made of? Our Recycled Leather is made from finely ground scraps of leather which would otherwise be discarded. The finished material is 90% post industrial waste combined with natural rubber.

Available for shipment in September 2011.

name: Linen Button Scarf - Pink or Gold Chevron on Natural Linen
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Linen Button Scarf in hot pink or gold on natural linen

Our Linen Button Scarf offers vintage texture and modern graphics in 3 color ways. A hand sewn wooden button & leather loop closure add function, warm details, and unisex appeal. Features original hand screened artwork by Piano Nobile. 

Ways to wear it: Wrap it twice around your neck and secure the button and loop to keep the chill out. Drape it once around for a cowl neckline. 

Materials: Cotton Linen, Leather, Wood

Dimensions: 30"x30" square results in 43" from loop to button 

Hand screen printed with original art work by Piano Nobile. Some variation in print quality and cropping will occur to due the very hand made nature of our items.

Original design and hand sewing by R&L Goods 
Original artwork and printing by Piano Nobile

name: Squid Track Jacket
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Here comes Trouble! American Apparel track jacket appliqued with a killer squid. A most useful layer for gents and ladies.

Available in American Apparel UNISEX sizes S,M,L,XL, and XXL. Model shown in Medium. Prone to some shrinking.

Care Instructions:
To give your Squid the longest life, and to minimize shrinking, we recommend machine washing inside out in cold water and hang drying. Handwashing is, of course, best.

name: Jellyfish Track Jacket
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Get ready for this Jelly! Handsome woodgrain Jellyfish appliqued across a 100% cotton unisex track jacket. A most useful layer for gents and ladies. 

Available in American Apparel UNISEX sizes M. Model shown in Medium. Prone to some shrinking.

Care Instructions:
To give your Jellyfish the longest life, and to minimize shrinking, we recommend machine washing inside out in cold water and hang drying. Handwashing is, of course, best.

name: Octopus Hoody
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Landlubbers beware! American Apparel unisex hoody appliqued with a plaid Octopus. A most useful layer for ladies and gents. 

Available in American Apparel UNISEX sizes S,M,L,XL. Model shown in Medium. Prone to some shrinking.

Care Instructions:
To give your Octopus Hoody the longest life, and to minimize shrinking, we recommend machine washing inside out in cold water and hang drying. Handwashing is, of course, best.

name: S.O.S. Pocket Monster Hoody
description:
+++Orders ship in 1-14 days. If you require your order by a specific date, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.+++

Landlubbers beware! American Apparel unisex hoody appliqued with a terrifying scene of peril at sea (or pocket). A most useful layer for ladies and gents. 

Available in American Apparel UNISEX sizes S,M,L, and XL. Models shown in Medium. Prone to some shrinking.

Care Instructions:
To give your Pocket Monster the longest life, and to minimize shrinking, we recommend machine washing inside out in cold water and hang drying. Handwashing is, of course, best.
